title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Bengals HC Zac Taylor on Burrow's "It" Factor, Ja'Marr Chase Pick, HUGE Ravens W
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Bengals HC Zac Taylor on Burrow's "It" Factor, Ja'Marr Chase Pick, HUGE Ravens W
description:
Colin talks about what Baker Mayfield has in common with Zoom and Bitcoin (3:00), how Twitter can fool NFL fans (5:00), and who USC should target for their next head coach now that Mike Tomlin has emphatically withdrawn himself as a candidate (8:00). Then, Bengals HC Zac Taylor and Colin discuss what early mistakes he has learned to avoid (11:00), the first time he saw Joe Burrow and how they’ve developed their relationship (14:00), what sold them on taking superstar rookie WR Ja'Marr Chase with the 5th overall pick in the draft (25:00) why they’ve been such a great 2nd-half team (28:00),how Sean McVay has influenced his coaching philosophy (31:00), how he’s become a better play caller (33:00), how he held the locker room together during the first two rough seasons (35:00), and inside the Bengals preparation before beating down the Ravens (38:00), how he plans to prevent a letdown with such a young team after such a huge division win. (44:00), and how long it took to get over a brutal OT loss to Green Bay (47:00).

Make sure you subscribe NOW! Also, follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
